text: Deborah Tobias Poritz (born October 26, 1936) is an American politician and lawyer. She was the chief justice of the New Jersey Supreme Court from 1996 to 2006. She was the Attorney General of New Jersey from 1994 to 1996. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:New Jersey attorneys general Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:Politicians from New Jersey Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:American judges
title: Deborah Poritz
